com.datamelt.rules.parser.xml

Class Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      • com.datamelt.rules.parser.xml.Parser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler

    public class Parser
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
implements org.xml.sax.ContentHandler
    this parser is used to parse rule definition files. rule files have to be written using the syntax as documented. groups, subgroups and rules are collected from the file. after the xml rule definition file has been parsed, an arraylist of groups is available, containing the subgroups and rules.
    Author:
    uwe geercken

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Parser(VariableReplacer replacer)
      constructor for a parser object that is used to parse a rule definition xml file. pass a VariableReplacer object to this constructor, which will be used to replace variables in the xml rule file with actual values.

      • parse

        public void parse(java.lang.String filename)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        pass a filename of an xml rule definition file to this method, which will in turn be parsed using SAX.
        Parameters:
        filename - the xml file to parse
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - exception if the xml file cannot be located or parsed

      • parse

        public void parse(java.io.InputStream stream)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        pass an inputstream of a xml file to this method, which will in turn be parsed using SAX.
        Parameters:
        stream - the input stream to use for parsing
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - exception during parsing the xml file
